homePageDescription: Quickly find departments and extensions across the entire organization.
settingsDescription: Manage application settings, import XML files, and configure appearance.
appearanceDescription: Customize the look and feel of the application.
languageDescription: Choose your preferred language for the application interface.
importOverwriteWarning: Importing files will overwrite existing files with the same name in the target directory. Please ensure you are uploading the correct files.
addLocalityDialogDescription: Enter the name for the new locality. This will create a new XML file and update the zone file.
editLocalityDialogDescription: Change the name of this locality. This will update the zone file and rename the department XML file.
addExtensionDialogDescription: Enter the details for the new extension. This will update the locality's XML file.
extensionNumberInvalid: Extension number must contain only digits.
serverExtensionNumberInvalid: SERVER: Extension telephone must be a valid number.
addBranchDialogDescription: Enter the name for the new branch. This will create a new XML file in the Branch directory and update the zone file.
editDialogGeneralDescription: Change the name of this item. This will update the parent XML file and rename the corresponding XML file if the ID changes.
confirmDeleteDescription: This action will delete the {itemType} "{itemName}" (ID: {itemId}). This action cannot be undone.
noItemsMatchSearch: Your search for "{searchTerm}" did not match any {itemType}.
noItemsFoundInZone: No {itemType} found in this zone. You can add new ones using the button above.
noExtensionsAvailable: No extensions currently available for {localityName}. You can add new ones using the button above.
extensionListCaption: A list of all extensions for {localityName}.
generalSettingsDescription: Manage general application settings like appearance and language.
dataManagementForBranchDescription: Localities for the {branchName} branch (within {zoneName} zone) are managed by editing the XML file at {dirPath}/branch/{branchId}.xml. Ensure this file contains <MenuItem> tags representing each locality. Deleting a locality here will remove it from this list and attempt to delete its department XML.
editExtensionDialogDescription: Modify the details for this extension. This will update the locality's XML file.
extensionUpdateNoChange: No changes detected for the extension.
extensionUpdateConflict: An extension with the new name and number already exists.
directoryConfigurationDescription: Specify the absolute root path where your '{dirPath}' XML directory structure is located. The application will read XML files from this path. Ensure MainMenu.xml file (PascalCase) and structural subdirectories 'zonebranch', 'branch', 'department' (all lowercase) exist within this path.
directoryPathInfo: The application will read XML files from this root. Ensure MainMenu.xml (PascalCase) and subfolders (zonebranch, branch, department - all lowercase) exist here.
directoryPathMustBeAbsolute: Directory path must be an absolute path.
noZonesAvailable: No zones available at the moment.
addZoneDialogDescription: Enter the name for the new zone. This will create a new entry in MainMenu.xml and a new zone branch XML file.
confirmDeleteZoneDescription: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete the zone "{zoneName}"?
confirmDeleteZoneWarningCascade: This action will permanently delete this zone and ALL its contained branches (if any) and ALL localities/departments within it. This action cannot be undone.
loginPageDescription: Please log in to access administrative features.
loginFailedError: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
loginUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
networkConfigurationDescription: Configure the Host IP/Hostname and Port used in the URLs within XML files located in your configured '{dirPath}' directory. This action updates MainMenu.xml and all files in '{dirPath}/zonebranch/' and '{dirPath}/branch/'.
serviceHostInfo: This Host and Port will be written into the URLs within your MainMenu.xml, zonebranch/*.xml, and branch/*.xml files.
xmlUrlUpdateFailure: Failed to update some XML URLs.
hostOrPortRequiredError: Host or Port must be provided to update XML URLs.
portMustBeNumericError: Port must be a valid number.
syncNamesFromXmlFeedTitle: Synchronize Extension Names from Custom XML Feed
syncNamesFromXmlFeedDescription: Enter one or more URLs (one per line) pointing to your custom XML feeds (e.g., PHP scripts) that output a <CiscoIPPhoneDirectory> containing extensions. The application will fetch data from these feeds, update the names of matching extension numbers in your local '{dirPath}/department/' XML files, and report any conflicts or extensions missing locally.
feedUrlRequiredError: At least one XML Feed URL is required.
syncConflictedExtensionsDescription: These extensions were not updated due to name conflicts across different feeds. Please resolve these conflicts manually in your source data or local files.
syncMissingExtensionsDescription: These extensions were found in your feeds but do not exist in any local department XML files. A 'Missing Extensions from Feed' item may have been created on the homepage if any were found.
syncNoConflicts: No name conflicts found across feeds for the same extension number.
syncNoMissing: All non-conflicted extensions from feeds were found locally or have been updated.
missingExtensionsFromFeedPrompt: Extensions found in feeds but not locally
importExtensionsFromCsvDescription: Upload a CSV file to bulk add extensions. The CSV should have columns: Name, Extension, LocalityID, ZoneID. If a LocalityID does not exist, a new department XML file will be created, and it will be linked in the specified ZoneID's menu file.
csvFormatHint: Expected columns: Name, Extension, LocalityID, ZoneID (first row can be headers).
csvImportUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during CSV import.
syncFromAdDescription: Fetch user and extension data directly from your Active Directory via LDAP. New 'Localities' will be created based on AD department attributes, under a dedicated 'Active Directory Users' zone.
adCredentialsWarning: Active Directory credentials are sent to the server for this operation only and are not stored by the application. For production, consider network-level security or service accounts with minimal privileges.
adSyncFailedError: Active Directory synchronization failed. Check details or server logs.
adSyncUnexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred during Active Directory synchronization.
moveExtensionsDialogDescription: Choose where to move the selected extensions. You can move them to an existing locality or create a new one.
enterNewLocalityNamePlaceholder: Enter name for the new locality...
selectZoneAndLocalityError: Please select a destination zone and locality.
selectZoneAndNameError: Please select a destination zone and provide a name for the new locality.
